entries.title: Intel's new driver update for Arc Alchemist keeps its GPU dreams alive
entries.description: New GPU drivers from Intel might help embattled Arc graphics cards become more competitive against AMD and Nvidia

entries.title: Intel’s 31TB SSD sees huge price drop at Walmart but it won’t fit your PC
entries.description: Almost as cheap as chips, at least per TB but it is a server only product

entries.title: Foldable iPad may launch early 2024, according to top Apple analyst
entries.description: There may also be no new iPads for 2023 as Apple works on future products like a revamped iPad Mini.

entries.title: Intel has killed off its open-source RISC-V dev environment
entries.description: Intel has shut the doors on its RISC-V Pathfinder environment, having only launched it in August 2022.

entries.title: This brutal new malware could absolutely destroy your Windows PC
entries.description: Cyberattack found rewriting crucial Windows files reportedly originates from Russia.

entries.title: Nvidia RTX 4060 and 4050 GPUs spotted – but don’t get your hopes up too much
entries.description: This is at least a hint that more affordable Lovelace graphics cards are inbound perhaps sooner than expected.

entries.title: Marshall's new tough Bluetooth speaker promises huge sound from a small box
entries.description: More speakers and controls than you expect for the size

entries.title: LG's new OLED TVs will get an audio upgrade to please home theater lovers
entries.description: LG's new OLED TVs for 2023 like the LG C3 OLED will support DTS:X audio which is sure to please home theater lovers.

entries.title: This is what caused the recent huge Microsoft 365 and Teams outage
entries.description: Serious outage affected Microsoft Teams, Outlook and more.

entries.title: Google Chrome is having some serious cloud storage issues
entries.description: Saving files to network storage is currently broken, thanks to a rogue element in Google’s File System Access API.

entries.title: Dead Space remaster suffers from ‘major graphical issue’ on PS5
entries.description: Graphical errors are making the Dead Space remaster look even murkier than the original.

entries.title: Nvidia RTX 4090 Ti GPU specs leaked – and it could come alongside an RTX Titan
entries.description: Yes, you read that right – we might see a pair of top-end GPUs to outgun the RTX 4090 flagship.

entries.title: Apple says these are the best security keys around now
entries.description: New iOS 16.3 update comes with security key compatibility, and Apple shares its picks.

entries.title: Samsung Galaxy S23 prices could mean bad news in some countries
entries.description: A new report suggests Samsung Galaxy S23 prices will vary widely between regions.

entries.title: This malware hides on USB drives, waiting to strike Windows machines
entries.description: PlugX malware is looking out for any USB device it can infect and hide your most important files.

entries.title: Meta’s best VR headset is down to its lowest-ever price, but not for long
entries.description: The Meta Quest Pro (the brand's best VR headset) is currently down to its lowest-ever price, but only for a week or two.

entries.title: You can now join a Microsoft Teams call from your car... but you probably shouldn't
entries.description: New Apple CarPlay means upgraded Microsoft Teams options.

entries.title: Invincible just added another great Walking Dead star to its cast
entries.description: Fans of the hugely popular Prime Video animated series think they know who he's voicing, too.

entries.title: These dodgy Android apps have seen over 20 million downloads
entries.description: Google Play Store is home to a growing number of dodgy Android apps promising financial rewards.

entries.title: The Last of Us showrunners explain that major episode 3 story shift
entries.description: The Last of Us showrunners Neil Druckmann and Craig Mazin explain why episode 3 deviates so greatly from the game.
